item.title: Kruger National Park Travel Guide (Mpumalanga/South Africa/Southern Africa/Africa)
item.description: Kruger National Park is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South Africa. This guide provides all the information a traveler needs to know, including places to visit, hiking routes, best things to do, where to stay, what to buy, do's and don'ts, safety and health, transportation options, nearby destinations, and much more.
